title: Wire frontend workout generation hooks to backend generate*Workout fixes for draft deployment

requirements.summary: Update frontend workout generation hooks to call backend generateFullBodyWorkout/generateUpperBodyWorkout/generateLowerBodyWorkout and handle Result responses so the new draft reflects only the intended functional fixes.
acceptanceCriteria: A new draft is produced and deployable.
The draft includes the default-profile fallback in all three generate functions and test-mode bypasses as specified, and does not add debug logging.

file_operations.description: Replace the placeholder implementations in useGenerateFullBodyWorkout() and useGenerateUpperBodyWorkout() to call the backend capabilities generateFullBodyWorkout() and generateUpperBodyWorkout(), handle ok/err Result responses consistently with useGenerateLowerBodyWorkout(), validate/convert the returned WorkoutWithNote into the frontend Workout shape, and keep existing error/toast behavior without adding new logging.
